product_name: Royal Robbins Sonora Hoodie Sweater - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Equally comfortable to wear during short naps or long road trips, the Royal Robbins Sonora hoodie sweater keeps you cozy thanks to a fleecy interior, handwarmer pockets and a generous hood. Cotton/polyester fabric resists wrinkles; soft fleece interior provides breathable warmth. Royal Robbins Sonora hoodie features a full-length zipper and zippered hand pockets; forward shoulder seams reduce friction under packs. Closeout.
short_description: Equally comfortable to wear during short naps or long road trips, the Royal Robbins Sonora hoodie sweater keeps you cozy thanks to a fleecy interior, handwarmer pockets and a generous hood.
